item.title: Dakota Fanning's Trending Horror Movie On Netflix Is Still Worth Watching, Despite Its Reviews
item.description: Though audiences may be avoiding Dakota Fanning’s The Watchers, the horror movie is currently trending on Netflix, proving it’s a worthwhile watch.

item.title: Why Dragon Is Barely In Shrek 2
item.description: Despite being a pivotal part of the first movie, Dragon is practically absent from Shrek 2, but there's a great explanation to account for this.

item.title: The Agency Episode 7 Review: The Psychological Game Intensifies As Martian & Samia's Story Finally Gets An Exciting Dose Of Honesty
item.description: After a slow start, The Agency episode 7 sees a couple of major storylines come to a head as Martian is forced to make the move he had been avoiding.
